description:
• Location:** Jenks, OK
• Join Our Team!** Gateway First Bank is seeking enthusiastic Mortgage Servicing Professionals to join our team! If you're passionate about providing exceptional customer service in a positive work environment, this is the opportunity for you. We prioritize the well-being of both our employees and customers, offering a supportive workplace culture and numerous benefits.
• Work Schedule:** Monday - Friday, 10 am - 7 pm shift (No Weekends!)
• Life-Changing Benefits:** We offer an array of benefits including tuition reimbursement, parental leave, and even pet insurance for your furry friends. Plus, after a probationary period, there's an opportunity for a hybrid remote schedule with certain requirements.

Job Summary

As a Mortgage Customer Service Specialist, you will play a crucial role in identifying and resolving customer service issues efficiently. You'll provide top-notch support to customers while ensuring their needs are met by knowledgeable specialists.

Essential Functions (Responsibilities)
• Respond promptly to customer inquiries and provide first-level support.
• Handle customer calls with professionalism and assurance, ensuring they are served by experts in mortgage services.
• Utilize technology systems to document and follow up on problem resolutions consistently.
• Maintain accurate customer records and update account information as needed.
• Resolve customer service problems by understanding their concerns, identifying solutions, and ensuring timely resolution.
• Communicate effectively with customers via phone, email, and written correspondence.
• Maintain awareness of potential fraudulent activity and report incidents to the appropriate department.

Required Qualifications
• Proficiency in Microsoft Word and Excel.
• Strong problem-solving skills.
• Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.
• Detail-oriented and organized.

Equivalent Education/Experience
• High School Diploma.
• Minimum of 1 year of related customer service experience.
• Preferred experience in a call center environment or mortgage banking.

Special Job Dimensions

The role involves spending approximately 70% of the time answering customer calls and ensuring issues are resolved promptly to achieve one-call resolution.

Employment Type: Full-Time
